an11.12:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
an11.12:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena mahānāmo sakko gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
an11.12:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ karonti:
an11.12:5.4: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an11.12:5.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an11.12:5.10: Tesaṃ no, bhante, nānāvihārehi viharataṃ kenassa vihārena vihātabban”ti?
an11.12:6.2: Etaṃ kho, mahānāma, tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kulaputtānaṃ yaṃ tumhe tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyātha:
an11.12:6.3: ‘tesaṃ no, bhante, nānāvihārehi viharataṃ kenassa vihārena vihātabban’ti?
an11.12:6.4: Saddho kho, mahānāma, ārādhako hoti, no assaddho;
an11.12:6.9: Imesu kho tvaṃ, mahānāma, pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cha dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi.
an11.12:7.1: * Idha tvaṃ, mahānāma, tathāgataṃ anussareyyāsi:
an11.12:7.4: Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an11.12:7.5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
an11.12:7.6: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ.
an11.12:7.7: Pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
an11.12:7.8: Imaṃ kho tvaṃ, mahānāma, buddhānussatiṃ gacchantopi bhāveyyāsi, ṭhitopi bhāveyyāsi, nisinnopi bhāveyyāsi, sayānopi bhāveyyāsi, kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhahantopi bhāveyyāsi, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvasantopi bhāveyyāsi.
an11.12:8.1: Puna caparaṃ tvaṃ, mahānāma, dhammaṃ anussareyyāsi … pe …
an11.12:8.8: Yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthūpapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṃvijjati.
an11.12:8.12: paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tatthūpapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī’ti.
an11.12:8.13: Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an11.12:8.14: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti devatā ārabbha.
an11.12:8.15: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ.
an11.12:8.16: Pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
an11.12:8.17: Imaṃ kho tvaṃ, mahānāma, devatānussatiṃ gacchantopi bhāveyyāsi, ṭhitopi bhāveyyāsi, nisinnopi bhāveyyāsi, sayānopi bhāveyyāsi, kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhahantopi bhāveyyāsi, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvasantopi bhāveyyāsī”ti.
